input.sentences: when they arrived home they noticed the rooms were disturbed .
they called the family to come and get them and they could see a fire as they arrive .
they didnt know that the whole town was on fire .
the fire burned for a very long time lighting up the night sky .
all the towns people stood alone the bridge and could not believe their eyes .
output.sentences: When the employees heard the fire alarm they all threw their work to the floor and ran.
As they arrived outside, they saw smoke billowing from the building.
They went a few hundred feet away as they saw the flames begin to light up the sky.
The flames engulfed the building as they looked on helplessly.
Everyone stood in horror as they realized the meaning of this fire.
